What time of code is she scanning? 
Is it a QR Code? 
QR codes have significant security issues because you have to trust the entity suggesting you scan it - without confidence in that it is like clicking on a link from an e-mail from an entity you don't know. It has the potential to infect your device. 
A better security practice is mutual authentication - that the two parties exchange some sort of proof of who they are before any information moves between then.
